title: Cosplay Change: Pure-kei Joshidaisei no Kiken na Seiheki

alternative_titles.ja: コスプレチェンジ ~ピュア系女子大生の危険な性癖~

synopsis: Aima Imoko is a young college student with a hobby of cosplay. Luckily there is a cosplay shop near her where she would like to try on a few outfits. On site she meets a hardcore otaku shop owner who also cosplays. Both are deep in their roles and she is a bit revealing, what are they supposed to do?
